column5: The tax bills sent out by the Province for the unorganized areas had due dates of Dec 3 for the first installment and Dec 31 for the final installment.  After considerable pressure from the ratepayers and members of parliament the dates have now beenchanged , the first installment is due Jan 31 and the final installment is due Feb 28.  Just thought there might be someone out there that was as po'd as I was since I got the bill on Dec 2.
My cottage is in an unorganized township and I also received my final tax bill December 2nd with the same 2 due dates.  Is there a link online for a press release or provides this information?
Found it:  http://news.ontario.ca/rev/en/2010/12/extension-of-deadline-for-provincial-land-tax-payments.html  Thanks grt1 for bringing this forward.
